criteria: Demonstrates understanding of personal responsibilities (e.g., hygiene, health habits).
Demonstrates understanding of social responsibilities (e.g., respecting others, following rules).
Demonstrates the ability to apply personal responsibilities in practical situations.
Demonstrates the ability to apply social responsibilities in practical situations.
descriptions: No understanding of personal responsibilities is demonstrated.
Shows minimal understanding of personal responsibilities; struggles to identify them.
Identifies basic personal responsibilities but has difficulty explaining their importance.
Explains personal responsibilities and their importance with some clarity.
Clearly explains personal responsibilities and their importance; provides relevant examples.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of personal responsibilities, their importance, and consistently applies them in relevant contexts.
No understanding of social responsibilities is demonstrated.
Shows minimal understanding of social responsibilities; struggles to identify them.
Identifies basic social responsibilities but has difficulty explaining their importance.
Explains social responsibilities and their importance with some clarity.
Clearly explains social responsibilities and their importance; provides relevant examples.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of social responsibilities, their importance, and consistently applies them in various social contexts.
Does not apply personal responsibilities in practical situations.
Struggles to apply personal responsibilities, even with guidance.
Attempts to apply personal responsibilities but inconsistently and with limited success.
Applies personal responsibilities with reasonable consistency in familiar situations.
Consistently applies personal responsibilities effectively in various situations.
Masterfully applies personal responsibilities, adapting strategies effectively in complex or novel situations; serves as a positive role model.
Does not apply social responsibilities in practical situations.
Struggles to apply social responsibilities, even with guidance.
Attempts to apply social responsibilities but inconsistently and with limited success.
Applies social responsibilities with reasonable consistency in familiar situations.
Consistently applies social responsibilities effectively in various situations.
Masterfully applies social responsibilities, adapting strategies effectively in complex or novel situations; promotes positive social interaction among peers.
